page.title: 13Farming
page.content: There are four farms in the area of the survey. All the farms grow crops mainly but all of them also keep some animals such as pigs, cows and sheep. Farming employs only a small number of people today as there has been a great amount of mechanisation over the last twenty years. Several hedges have been removed also to make it easier to use machinery. Sugar beet is an important crop to most of the farmers, but we found that most of the farmers we talked to disliked the high level of mechanisatio which had to be used for this type of crop and complained about the frequent breakdowns that had to be dealt with.
